practice_phrases: 一个问题
a question
这是一个问题
this is a question
他们需要问一个问题
they need to ask a question
那不会是一个问题
that wouldn't be a question
我们可以要一瓶红葡萄酒吗？这是一个问题
could we have a bottle of red wine? this is a question
他们不需要问一个问题，如果你问我
they don't need to ask a question, if you ask me
如果他们想让人们喜欢他们，他们需要问一个问题
if they want people to like them, they need to ask a question
因为他们已经知道他变弱了，那不会是一个问题
because they already know he's getting weak, that wouldn't be a question
他们想在明年领先，所以他们需要问一个问题
they want to lead the way next year, so they need to ask a question
我们不能让他们赢得一切，这是一个问题，如果你问我
we couldn't allow them to win everything, this is a question, if you ask me
